title: to everyone saying annie has no counterplay
body: maybe you should learn to dodge her q

replies.body: Yeah, dodging point and click abilities is super easy.

> [{quoted}](name=Lugg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YXXEVugN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-26T18:48:08.057+0000)
>
> Yeah, dodging point and click abilities is super easy.

It's a joke doofus
I know it was, just being sarcastic :D
you suck at sarcasm
Wow, it's amazing how dense some people are.
The irony is strong.

I guess you won't get this either. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RAY27NU1Jog

I get it.

I don't get how it's relevant.
Sigh

This whole thing was so hard to read.

You're trying to save face so bad... FailFish
It gets even worse and more lame with every response lmao.
Someone, ban this man for his own good.
It actually is, I just {{summoner:4}} when I see the enemy's cursor hovering over me #duh

Finally, someone who gets it. 

I was starting to lose my faith in humanity with the immense number of idiotic responses I was getting.
Someone's really mad.
I just wish her ult wasnt instant. Riot nerfed veigars e for being instant and followed by huge burst. By that reasoning, she should at least have a small delay on her ult, .5 secs at max

Riot nerfed viegars stun for shutting down zed and lee sin as support in korean LC$. 

there was no "big damage" following up from the support position. they built him CDR and used cages to keep mobility under control. 

Theres nothing riot hates more then people trying to find ways to combat mobility creep.
Rito nerfs anyone who can stop #LCSBIGPLAYS, thats why Shen is getting a nerf, although a slight one, rightt?
Veigar's ability was a basic ability, Annie's is her ult. World of difference there.
Annie can stun with three abilities, I don't see the difference.

Oh yeah. She stuns with her ult so often, I forgot she can do it with any spell.

The point stands though, it's based on casting multiple times, so she doesn't always have it available.
you can easily just spam q to farm since it refunds the mana cost completely
Yeah, you can charge your stun FAAAAAR FASTER than the cooldown on Veigar's cage was.
Sure if you spam all your abilities and run yourself out of mana; mana-gement (oh ho ho) is important in lane.

Yeah, Q gives her mana back.

Not to mention that Veigar RUNS OUT OF MANA USING ONLY HIS Q IN LANE. So I'm not sure why you're trying to use that as an argument.
and he does that with his passive being increased mana regeneration

Lol, the only thing his passive does is enable him to keep farming Q when really low. It honestly sucks ass anything about that. You hit 1 E in lane and you're fucked. Honestly, if your jungler ganks the enemy Veigar early, Veigar is going to be sooooo far behind because he won't be able to even farm anymore.

> [{quoted}](name=toonpang,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YXXEVugN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-26T18:27:22.721+0000)
>
> Great meme
> 
> Jokes aside, people really need to learn to buy Banshee's Veil [which cuts out either all of her stun, or 33% of her damage], and to just respect the area of control of a short-ranged mage.
> 
> Annie could definitely do with a small nerf to her AP ratios [10% nerf], but really doesn't need to be changed into another {{champion:45}}

The only problem I have with her is the little to no indication of her ultimate, maybe a 0.25 second increase in cast time, and a more visible and distinguishable animation.

And while they are doing it , maybe at that delay , distinguishable animation to every single mobility skill in game , how can i know where they are going/if they are going if all that mobility is instant? i can never prepare, i must always react and be on the defensive...
Pink spear the wards with CC.
I don't see anything about % max hp true damage in there. Not sure I can trust you on this one.
Pink spear the wards with %max hp true CC.
Just use a Lee Sin ult to kick the ward into your nexus, causing instant death to your whole team.
Because I'm Lee Sin, the Blind Monk.

Just win wall it or go untargetable.

There's a reason annie is one of the few immobile mages that work,and that's because you can't "hurr durr ez mobility ez outplay" her.

The problem isn't annie,the problem are hyper mobile bullshits,you nerf them and annie will fall off due to her inferior range compared to that of immobile mages.

You realize Annie hardcore shits on Yasuo in lane?

"Windwall it" lol
It's alway nice to have some counter to mobility.

> [{quoted}](name=manbearswine,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YXXEVugN,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-08-26T20:33:12.419+0000)
> There's a reason annie is one of the few immobile mages that work,and that's because you can't "hurr durr ez mobility ez outplay" her.

Few immobile mages that work? Of the top 20 winrate mids atm, 19 of those are mages and the only ones with dashes or blinks are Ahri, Lissandra, and TF's ultimate, which can't really be used as a mobility tool in combat.

I know the boards love to circlejerk the same thing for 2 years and turn a blind eye to the reality around them, but this isn't an assassin meta. Immobile mages are strong.

http://champion.gg/statistics/#?sortBy=general.winPercent&order=descend&roleSort=Middle

I would argue that MS counts as mobility which means top 20 winrate mids with mobility are: 
kennen, ahri, talon, TF, lulu, lissandra, zilean. 

you missed talon with his blink but otherwise i was surprised at how many comparatively immobile champions topped that list.

The mobile mids are popular but often don't win as much as the immobile ones. Interesting.

Of course. What's their pick rate? Who plays the immobile mids versus who plays the mobile ones? It's probably a case of people picking the mobile ones for frelo and then sucking against someone who mains an immobile and can deal with their bullshit. Like once when I had a Zed complain about my stun. I was {{champion:63}}. Apparently, one conditional, skillshot reliant stun is op guys. Never knew.

> What's their pick rate? 

Rates are in the link to champion.gg

>Who plays the immobile mids versus who plays the mobile ones?

which lists statistics for plat+ ranked accounts. 

Haha, yeah brand is fun. Feel the burn.
Viktor is pretty popular, along with azir. One of the two are guaranteed in an LCS game. Azir does have the dash to soldier thing though.
^That's a good one.
Immobile mages can definitely work it's by no means a dead class like some of the idiots on this forum think.
The AoE stun + damage is pretty indiscriminate and as much a problem - if not more - for people who are less mobile because they can't avoid her range as well.
Easy, change annie's q into skillshot. Won't be a problem then

If Annie's q were a skill shot she'd be terrible. her farming phase is dependent on her being able to kill minions with it, if it hits the first character it hits instead of a targeted character that's a major nerf. she has a tiny ass range I don't know how you guys can complain so much about her, if she doesn't burn flash to all-in on you or you don't make the stupid mistake of walking into her she's easy to deal with, and she can't do anything really strong until 6 anyways so just zoning her until then and backing up is easy
Or she could last hit like every other champion
If they clean up her attack animation, I'd be cool with that. She's almost Karthus level bad.
